Example using Kedro's DataCatalog to configure and explore data sources

{% raw %}

cd[source]

cd(newdir)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

change_cwd_dir[source]

change_cwd_dir(new_dir)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_config[source]

get_config(env, patterns, globals_pattern=`'globals.yml'`)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_catalog[source]

get_catalog(env:Union[str, List[str]]='base', patterns=`['catalog.yml', 'catalog.yaml', 'catalog/.yml', 'catalog/.yaml']`, globals_pattern=`'globals.yml'`)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_parameters[source]

get_parameters(env='base', patterns=`['param.yml', 'param.yaml', 'param/.yml', 'param/.yaml']`)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

reload_catalog[source]

reload_catalog(catalog)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

reload[source]

reload()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_config("base", patterns=["catalog*.yml", "catalog*.yaml", "catalog*/*.yml", "catalog*/*.yaml"])["globals_test"]

{'type': 'pandas.CSVDataSet', 'filepath': 'base/path/iris.csv'}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_config(["local", "base"], patterns=["catalog*.yml", "catalog*.yaml", "catalog*/*.yml", "catalog*/*.yaml"])["globals_test"]

{'type': 'pandas.CSVDataSet', 'filepath': 'base/path/iris.csv'}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_config(["base", "local"], patterns=["catalog*.yml", "catalog*.yaml", "catalog*/*.yml", "catalog*/*.yaml"])["globals_test"]

{'type': 'pandas.CSVDataSet', 'filepath': 'local/path/iris.csv'}
{% endraw %}

Congratulations! You have been able to instantiate a DataCatalog and load a dataset with Kedro. To see more examples on how to use the DataCatalog and other supported datasets, please visit our documentation.
